text: The Wolf Whisperer
The mark of the Iron Wolf unlocks a glimpse of the future, be it mere seconds.
Strengthens the warband’s unity, hardening warriors with the pride of their clan.
The Iron Wolf Tribe
Twisted armor and blades shimmer with Tzeentch’s touch, resisting both steel and sorcery.
Corrupted Iron
Aelfric is shielded by wards of Chaos, deflecting mortal blows.
Secrets of the Plains
A fearsome battle cry that shatters enemy resolve and emboldens allies.
Iron Howl
The pack’s rallying cry steels hearts, raising morale and banishing fear.
Call of the Den
Beast pelts infused with Chaos magic protect their wearers against cold and wounds.
Unnatural Furs
Legacy of the Iron Wolves grants unyielding discipline and hardened will.
The Iron Wolf Tribe
Hardened raiders from the frontier, striking deep into enemy lands with savage fury.
World's Edge Marauders
The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.
Chaos Steed
